document.full_text: kathy hochul's victory in a conservative new york district deals a blow to the national republican party in a race that largely turned on the party's plan to overhaul medicare.
document.title: democrat wins g.o.p. seat; rebuke seen to medicare plan
lines_and_colors: kathy hochul's victory in a conservative new york district deals a blow to the national republican party in a race that largely turned on the party's plan to overhaul medicare.
